title: Famous Last Words
description: Notable final quotes from famous people

questions.question: Which nurse and humanitarian reportedly said, 'I only regret that I have but one life to lose for my country' before his execution?
Who is credited with saying 'Et tu, Brute?' upon being assassinated in 44 BC?

questions.question: Marie Antoinette's famous last words, 'Pardon me, sir, I did not do it on purpose,' were said after she accidentally did what?
Which witty author reportedly said on his deathbed, 'Either that wallpaper goes, or I do'?
Humphrey Bogart's last words were reportedly, 'I should never have switched from Scotch to...' what?
Which famous general said, 'Let us cross over the river and rest under the shade of the trees' as his final words?
Steve Jobs' last words, according to his sister, were 'Oh wow. Oh wow.' What was he reportedly looking at?
options: Something beyond his loved ones' shoulders

questions.question: Which founding father's last words were reportedly 'Is it the Fourth?' referring to July 4th?
Winston Churchill's last words are believed to have been what simple statement?
Which Dutch painter reportedly said, 'The sadness will last forever' before dying from a self-inflicted gunshot wound?
Karl Marx was asked by his housekeeper if he had any last words. What was his famous reply?
options: 'Go on, get out! Last words are for fools who haven't said enough'

questions.question: Which legendary outlaw reportedly said 'Who the hell is Tom O'Day?' just before he was shot and killed?
Benjamin Franklin wrote which famous line about death and taxes in a 1789 letter?
options: 'Death is certain, taxes even more so'
'Nothing is certain except death and taxes'
'Taxes follow us even to the grave'

questions.question: Which legendary queen reportedly said, 'All my possessions for a moment of time' on her deathbed?
